author: 0x4c6565
body:
Ref #3475 

This pull request adds support for the Port parameter when establishing a new SSH PSSession.

Examples:

``New-PSSession -HostName "localhost" -Port 8080``
``New-PSSession -SSHConnection @{"ComputerName"="localhost";"Port"="8080"}``

comments.author: 0x4c6565
comments.body: Fail merge from master on my behalf with tests, will push a fix later

comments.author: 0x4c6565
comments.body: Reverted SSHRemotingAPI.Tests.ps1 to master, added back in new test, and made requested changes to existing tests

title: Adds Port parameter for SSH PSSessions
